products.text: The frame around the bottom of the mirror forms a shelf where you can put your make up, mobile phone or wallet.

products.text: LED technology allows you to simulate an incandescent filament, which in combination with the decorative finish of the base makes the light bulb look like an old one.

products.text: This lamp with an internal opaque glass shade and an external colored glass shade provides directional lighting and mood lighting.

products.text: The textile lampshade, which gently diffuses the light, creates a cozy and inviting atmosphere in the room.

products.name: Long candle (pack of 2)
products.text: Basic long candle for candlesticks. Sold in packs of 2. WARNING: - Keep in view. - Keep away from children. - Place vertically on a suitable surface. - Keep away from draughts and flammable objects.

products.name: FENOMEN
products.text: The flickering of a candle will create a welcoming atmosphere at any moment-it will light up a dark winter morning, turn an ordinary dinner into a romantic one and make the room more cozy.
